info.title: API Documentation
info.description: This is the API documentation for the project.

post.description: Registers a new user and returns an authentication token.
Logs in an admin and returns an authentication token.
Logs out the currently authenticated user and invalidates their tokens.

get.summary: Get details of a specific kebab
get.description: Returns the details of a specific kebab including associated sauces, meat types, social media links, opening hours, and order methods.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing kebab along with its associated entities like sauces, meats, social media links, opening hours, and order methods.

is_craft.description: Whether the kebab is a craft kebab

building_type.description: The type of building where the kebab is located

is_chain.description: Whether the kebab is part of a chain

sauces.description: List of sauce types associated with the kebab

meats.description: List of meat types associated with the kebab

social_media_links.description: Social media links for the kebab

delete.description: Deletes a kebab by its ID.

get.summary: Get a list of all kebabs
get.description: Returns a list of all kebabs along with their associated data.

post.description: Creates a new kebab with the provided data and associates related entities like sauces, meats, social media links, opening hours, and order methods.

is_craft.description: Whether the kebab is a craft kebab

building_type.description: The type of building where the kebab is located

is_chain.description: Whether the kebab is part of a chain

sauces.description: List of sauce types associated with the kebab

meats.description: List of meat types associated with the kebab

social_media_links.description: Social media links for the kebab

get.summary: Check if the user is logging in for the first time
get.description: Check if the user is logged in for the first time.

post.summary: Change password for the first login
post.description: Change the password for the first admin login.

is_admin.description: Indicates if the user is an admin

is_first_login.description: Indicates if this is the user's first login

status.description: Current status of the kebab place

is_craft.description: Indicates if the kebab is a craft kebab

building_type.description: Type of building the kebab operates in

is_chain.description: Indicates if the kebab place is part of a chain

id.description: Unique identifier for the meat type
Unique identifier for the opening hour
